name: All For One (itch) (Zwinzler Games)
description:
Battling powerful enemies can get lonely by yourself! In All For One, form a community of adventurers, and work together to defeat monsters and save the world.

All For One is a short turn-based battle game, created over the course of two weeks for the GDEX Game Jam 2020. To match the jam theme of Community, All For One is all about forming a team that works better together and brings out each other's strengths!

Directions:

All For One is a point-and-click game, so the controls are super simple:

Click a player to select them

Use the dropdown in the bottom left corner to select an action for them for their turn

Click GO to start the round!

All work done by Audrey Winzeler of Zwinzler Games
